name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a skilled Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in utilizing **Python**, **Flask**, **Node.js**, and **Vue.js** to build and deploy scalable solutions. My full-stack development expertise encompasses leading modern data architectures and distributed systems focused on optimal performance and code simplicity. With proficiency in cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**, I ensure robust, secure, and compliant applications in healthcare and financial sectors. My problem-solving abilities are complemented by a proven track record in collaboration within teams, allowing for efficient project execution and innovative solutions. Additionally, I have hands-on experience integrating CI/CD practices, thus contributing to streamlined development processes, while adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
